channel.title: CVE Feed for Xen -- Xen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xen -- Xen

item.title: CVE-2024-31142|2024-05-16T13:39:42.774Z -- Xen -- Xen
item.description:
Because of a logical error in XSA-407 (Branch Type Confusion), the mitigation is not applied properly when it is intended to be used. XSA-434 (Speculative Return Stack Overflow) uses the same infrastructure, so is equally impacted.
For more details, see: https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-407.html https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-434.html

item.title: CVE-2024-2193|2024-03-15T21:25:07.075Z -- Xen -- Xen
item.description: A Speculative Race Condition (SRC) vulnerability that impacts modern CPU architectures supporting speculative execution (related to Spectre V1) has been disclosed. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to disclose arbitrary data from the CPU using race conditions to access the speculative executable code paths.
